channel.title: Antrea on From 0.985mhz... to several Ghz

item.title: Antrea Egress
item.description: Antrea Egress: What is Egress when we talk about Kubernetes? Well if a pod wants to communicate to the outside world, outside the Kubernetes cluster it runs in, out of the worker node the pod resides on, this is egress traffic (definition "the action of going out of or leaving a place" and in network terminology means the direction is outward from itself). Why does egress matter? Well, usually when the pods communicate out, they will use the IP address of the worker node they currently is deployed on.
